dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset generated using CARLA simulator, containing 271 video clips focused on lane change scenarios with a no-collision:collision label distribution of 6.12:1.
dcterms:title: 271-syn

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset generated using CARLA simulator, containing 1,043 video clips focused on lane change scenarios with a no-collision:collision label distribution of 7.91:1.
dcterms:title: 1043-syn

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset created by sub-sampling the 1043-syn dataset to achieve a balanced dataset with a 1:1 distribution of no-collision and collision clips.
dcterms:title: 306-syn

dcterms:creator: V. Ramanishka
Y.-T. Chen
dcterms:description: Real-world driving dataset containing 571 lane-change video clips from the Honda Driving Dataset, recorded during mostly safe driving in the California Bay Area.
dcterms:title: 571-honda

dcterms:creator: Y. Yao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: Complex real-world driving dataset containing challenging collision scenarios drawn from the Detection of Traffic Anomaly dataset, featuring a wide range of driving actions and conditions.
dcterms:title: 620-dash
